
```
impl Solution {
    pub fn is_power_of_four(num: i32) -> bool {
//    4 -> 0b00000000000000000000000000000100 ->  3
//   16 -> 0b00000000000000000000000000010000 ->  5
//   64 -> 0b00000000000000000000000001000000 ->  7
//  256 -> 0b00000000000000000000000100000000 ->  9
// 1024 -> 0b00000000000000000000010000000000 -> 11
// 4096 -> 0b00000000000000000001000000000000 -> 13
//16384 -> 0b00000000000000000100000000000000 -> 15

//         0b01010101010101010101010101010100
        match num {
            0 => {false},
            1 => {true},
            num if num.abs()&(num.abs()-1) != 0 => {false},
            _ => {num == num.abs()&(0b01010101010101010101010101010100) as i32},
        }
    }
}
```
